a polite word for a man, used especially when talking to or about a man you do not know
Could you serve this gentleman please, Miss Bath?
An elderly gentleman was asleep next to the fire.
a man who is always polite, has good manners, and treats other people well
Martin – always the perfect gentleman – got to his feet when my mother walked in.
Mr Field was a real gentleman.
a man from a high social class, especially one whose family owns a lot of property
